title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Authentic Italian pasta with crispy pancetta, eggs, and parmesan cheese. Simple, elegant, and incredibly delicious.
instructions: ["Bring a large pot of salted water to boil","Cook spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente, about 8-9 minutes","Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat","Add diced pancetta and cook for 5-6 minutes until crispy","If using garlic, add it to pancetta for the last minute","In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated parmesan, and a generous amount of black pepper","Reserve 1 cup of pasta cooking water before draining","Drain pasta and immediately add to the skillet with pancetta","Remove skillet from heat","Quickly pour egg mixture over hot pasta and toss vigorously","Add reserved pasta water gradually while tossing until sauce is creamy","Season with more black pepper and parmesan","Serve immediately while hot"]

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Tender chicken pieces in a rich and creamy tomato-based curry sauce. This popular Indian dish is aromatic, flavorful, and perfect with rice or naan.
ingredients: [{"name":"chicken breast","amount":"600","unit":"g","category":"key","substitutes":["chicken thighs","turkey breast"],"notes":"cut into cubes"},{"name":"basmati rice","amount":"200","unit":"g","category":"key","substitutes":["jasmine rice","brown rice"],"notes":""},{"name":"greek yogurt","amount":"150","unit":"ml","category":"important","substitutes":["plain yogurt","sour cream"],"notes":""},{"name":"canned tomatoes","amount":"400","unit":"g","category":"important","substitutes":["fresh tomatoes"],"notes":"crushed"},{"name":"heavy cream","amount":"200","unit":"ml","category":"important","substitutes":["coconut cream","cashew cream"],"notes":""},{"name":"onion","amount":"1","unit":"piece","category":"important","substitutes":["shallots"],"notes":"large, diced"},{"name":"garlic","amount":"4","unit":"cloves","category":"flavor","substitutes":["garlic paste"],"notes":"minced"},{"name":"ginger","amount":"2","unit":"tbsp","category":"flavor","substitutes":["ground ginger"],"notes":"fresh, grated"},{"name":"garam masala","amount":"2","unit":"tsp","category":"flavor","substitutes":["curry powder"],"notes":""},{"name":"cumin","amount":"1","unit":"tsp","category":"flavor","substitutes":["coriander"],"notes":""},{"name":"paprika","amount":"1","unit":"tsp","category":"flavor","substitutes":["chili powder"],"notes":""},{"name":"lemon","amount":"1","unit":"piece","category":"flavor","substitutes":["lime"],"notes":"juiced"},{"name":"cilantro","amount":"20","unit":"g","category":"flavor","substitutes":["parsley"],"notes":"for garnish"},{"name":"vegetable oil","amount":"2","unit":"tbsp","category":"base","substitutes":[],"notes":""},{"name":"salt","amount":"","unit":"to taste","category":"base","substitutes":[],"notes":""}]
instructions: ["In a bowl, combine chicken with yogurt, lemon juice, half the garlic, half the ginger, 1 tsp garam masala, and salt","Marinate for at least 15 minutes or up to 2 hours in refrigerator","Cook rice according to package instructions and keep warm","Heat 1 tbsp oil in a large skillet over high heat","Remove chicken from marinade and cook in batches until golden brown, about 3 minutes per side","Remove chicken and set aside","In the same pan, heat remaining oil over medium heat","Add diced onion and cook for 5 minutes until softened","Add remaining garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute until fragrant","Add cumin, paprika, remaining garam masala, and cook for 30 seconds","Pour in crushed tomatoes and bring to a simmer","Cook for 10 minutes until sauce thickens","Stir in heavy cream and season with salt","Return chicken to pan and simmer for 5 minutes","Garnish with fresh cilantro","Serve over basmati rice"]

title: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad Bowl
description: Fresh and vibrant vegetarian bowl packed with protein-rich chickpeas, crisp vegetables, feta cheese, and a tangy lemon-herb dressing. Perfect for meal prep!
ingredients: [{"name":"chickpeas","amount":"400","unit":"g","category":"key","substitutes":["white beans","black beans","lentils"],"notes":"canned, drained"},{"name":"quinoa","amount":"150","unit":"g","category":"key","substitutes":["couscous","bulgur","rice"],"notes":"cooked"},{"name":"cherry tomatoes","amount":"250","unit":"g","category":"important","substitutes":["diced tomatoes"],"notes":"halved"},{"name":"cucumber","amount":"1","unit":"piece","category":"important","substitutes":[],"notes":"large, diced"},{"name":"red onion","amount":"0.5","unit":"piece","category":"important","substitutes":["white onion","shallot"],"notes":"thinly sliced"},{"name":"bell pepper","amount":"1","unit":"piece","category":"important","substitutes":[],"notes":"red or yellow, diced"},{"name":"feta cheese","amount":"150","unit":"g","category":"important","substitutes":["goat cheese","vegan feta"],"notes":"crumbled"},{"name":"kalamata olives","amount":"80","unit":"g","category":"flavor","substitutes":["black olives"],"notes":"pitted"},{"name":"lemon","amount":"1","unit":"piece","category":"flavor","substitutes":["lime","red wine vinegar"],"notes":"juiced"},{"name":"parsley","amount":"15","unit":"g","category":"flavor","substitutes":["cilantro","mint"],"notes":"fresh, chopped"},{"name":"oregano","amount":"1","unit":"tsp","category":"flavor","substitutes":["italian seasoning"],"notes":"dried"},{"name":"olive oil","amount":"4","unit":"tbsp","category":"base","substitutes":[],"notes":"extra virgin"},{"name":"salt","amount":"","unit":"to taste","category":"base","substitutes":[],"notes":""},{"name":"black pepper","amount":"","unit":"to taste","category":"base","substitutes":[],"notes":""}]
instructions: ["Cook quinoa according to package instructions if not already prepared","Let quinoa cool to room temperature","Rinse and drain canned chickpeas thoroughly","Halve cherry tomatoes","Dice cucumber into bite-sized pieces","Thinly slice red onion","Dice bell pepper","Chop fresh parsley","In a large bowl, combine chickpeas, quinoa, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, bell pepper, and olives","In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper","Pour dressing over salad and toss gently to combine","Add crumbled feta cheese and chopped parsley","Toss again lightly","Serve immediately or refrigerate for up to 3 days"]
